extendedInfo.description: Stop typing your lists and todos on that tiny keyboard! VocaList uses speech to text technology for quick and easy creation and management of all of your lists, tasks, and todos. Lists and items can be created using the time saving voice recognition feature which converts your voice into text. Of course, typing them the old fashioned way is supported too! Keep track of your progress by crossing off tasks and todo items with the swipe of a finger. Each list is clearly marked with the number of unfinished items remaining. This list making app is intuitive to use so you won't have to complete one of those annoying tutorials. Using VocaList is a simple way to organize your life!Use VocaList for keeping track of:* tasks* shopping lists* grocery lists* to-dos* to-don'ts* goals* wish lists* things to remember* pantry items* song/music lists* favorite wines* quotes* bucket listsVocaList is similar to these apps:List MasterTasks To Do ListTurboListMighty Grocery Shopping ListOut of MilkToMarket Grocery Shopping ListVoiceShoppingListFound a bug? Email a description to dazeysoft@gmail.com and we'll fix it as soon as possible!

reviews.title: Amazing voice recognition
reviews.comment: Intuitive and clean, with the best voice recognition I\'ve ever seen. One small beef. After I add an item to a list, please display the end of the list so I don\'t can verify the new item, not the beginning of the list.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Excellant App !
reviews.comment: Wow, this app has made my life so much easier. Not complex, easy to use. No learning curve so was able to use right away. Even emailed my lists to my niece, which had items crossed off that were done and emailed her the list from the app, The app had separated the done and not done items from the list into separate areas so she would know the progress.   Thanks for making it simple and productive!  Suggested feature would be to be able to re-organize a list on the screen so the completed projects would relocate to the bottom of the list leaving those still needing to be completed at the top..This makes it easier on a large list to read the tasks yet to be done without scrolling through all the items on the list.  I understand that you can delete completed items, but when people keep adding projects to your work list while you are working on getting things done, and you are  also emailing them status updates (the vocalist) on what has been done and not done, you really like them to see how much work you are accomplishing.and how much more they are tasking you.
reviews.author: Ted W

reviews.title: Really like all my lists in one place.
reviews.comment: Easy app to use. Can create multiple lists very easily and quickly. Wish it would allow drop and drag of lists or items in a list to rearrange. Also wish there was a way to create a notification or reminder for certain items (like in a to do list).
reviews.author: Garret Brandt

reviews.title: Most Excellent!
reviews.comment: Works wonderful and its so easy; I love this app!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: gerry
reviews.comment: Best App for this purpis I have come across   ( 5 Stars from me )
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Use this often
reviews.comment: Really helps me organize and not forget things. The voice recognition is really good.  Would love it if I could email some of my lists to my email so I can print them. Also would be great if you could move the unchecked or most important notes to higher places on your list. Maybe have words color able also to show priority.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Just what I wanted, droid razor max
reviews.comment: I\'m using the droid razor max and this app works great.  The other apps I\'ve looked at are much more cumbersome. It\'s really nice just to be able to talk the items in several at a time rather than speaking and waiting and speaking then waiting.  Other apps might have more sophistication and sorting and that sort of thing but most of us for grocery list and to do lists just want to enter it in quickly without having to type it in.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Poor speech to text
reviews.comment: Very poor speach recognition Last update killed this app. Will not recognize most simple words like \"tea\" comes up as Pete.  App is useless and will not live up to it\'s name unless fixed.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Yfoog
reviews.comment: Awesome app.  No special permissions, AND performs great!!  One of my best apps
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Clever name :)
reviews.comment: Very straightforward and easy to use.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Clever name and the brilliant functionality to back it up. Kudos! Looking forward to being able to set due dates and priorities.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: This app makes lists SO easy for the type A personality. making a list with vocalist is 1000 times quicker than typing this comment :-)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Awesome app!! Does exactly what it says! Im a verizon wireless representative, and I am definately reccomending this app to all of my customers!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Really useful for planning the day while driving to work. Just talk to add little tasks as they pop into your head. Not sure how I managed without it.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Perfectly simple
reviews.comment: I would like a check box next to each item and an option to clear all checks. This would help with simple reoccurring to do punch lists like a camping materials list etc...
reviews.author: Jason Frisco
